headline: ‘Baby steps’ toward retirement: Prudential gives Generation Beta a savings kick start and launches first-of-kind study
summary: NEWARK, N.J., January 01, 2025--Today Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) joins the world in welcoming Generation Beta (people born Jan. 1, 2025, to Dec. 31, 2039) by commissioning a first-of-its-kind report, Generation Beta: Redefining Life, Longevity, and Retirement, that reveals how Americans envision the future, and how technological, social and economic shifts will impact their financial security.
